survey.title: AA EXTENDED USE CONCEPT/PRODUCT TEST SCREENER
survey.introduction: Hello, I'm from (your company), an independent marketing research company. We're conducting a survey with women about various consumer products.
survey.criteria: Interview women only, female 18+ years or older.

questions.question: Into which of the following age groups does your age belong?
options: CHECK QUOTA TO DETERMINE IF NEEDED.
IF OVER QUOTA, ASK FOR ANOTHER FEMALE IN AGE GROUP NEEDED.

questions.question: Which of the following products do you use daily?
questions.note: CONTINUE ONLY IF CIGARETTES CHECKED ABOVE IN Q.2. OTHERWISE, ASK FOR ANOTHER FEMALE HOUSEHOLD MEMBER 18+ AND GO BACK TO Q.1. IF NONE, TERMINATE, ERASE AND RE-USE.

questions.question: Which of the following brands have you used in the past week?
